results.content: Thank you Patrick, I've learned a lot!!! It's so easy if you know how. But I guess it took you some time to prepare the course. I liked the structure of the course, the clear separation of server and client, the step-by-step evolving of the code, real nice. The only thing that did not work in my case was the deployment to a windows server with IISNode. I couldn't get IISNode installed, the Windows Installer missed some part. A question is how to deploy the data now currently in my local Maria-DB. Thanks again and regards Emile

response.content: Hi Emile, Thank you so much for your feedback. Means a lot! It's so great to see your appreciation of the time and effort that goes into making a course like that. To talk about your further questions, please send me a direct message and we should find a solution. Take care, Patrick
response.content_html: Hi Emile, Thank you so much for your feedback. Means a lot! It's so great to see your appreciation of the time and effort that goes into making a course like that. To talk about your further questions, please send me a direct message and we should find a solution. Take care, Patrick

I will change this review to 5 starts if above is provided and up to date with the actual blog.

results.content:
I have over 100 courses, most unfinished, some down to me, some down to the content, I am only 30% through right now, but this is THE BEST course I have taken, hands down.
Yes, you would want some prior knowledge of angular, but the author mentions that at the start, but if you have a good idea of the basics, what a component, service, etc is, then this course so far has been the most time effective quick start toward a fully working application, even has a backend in and sequelize, and the front end, and a working basic blog. 5*!

response.content: Thank you so much, Steve! Your review really means a lot to me. So glad the course suits your needs and your happy with the time effective approach. Take care, Patrick
response.content_html: Thank you so much, Steve! Your review really means a lot to me. So glad the course suits your needs and your happy with the time effective approach. Take care, Patrick
